reviewText: The dvd is corrupted.  Please let ne knownif you can send me a new.one.  I will return this one.  We did not notice this until today when we start to watch it.
Great film about rebirth. A woman solves her problems in this life by regressing in hypnosis into her past lives.
Loved the movie and the soundtrack, fan of foreign films, keeps you in suspense throughout the entire movie. good quality of sound and video as well. Would recommend.

Dangerous Ishhq is a very entertaining story about multiple reincarnations. I've already seen this movie twice.

This movie requires red-cyan glasses (4 pairs are included in the package). The movie is somewhat dark because of the colored glasses. Nevertheless, the 3D effects are wonderful.

Polarized or active glasses do not work with this movie.

A 2D version of this movie is not included in the package.

I love Bollywood, have seen over 1,500.  Reincarnated lovers search for each other. Karisma Kapoor has been away for awhile and this her comeback film. If you love the old fashioned Bollywood, you can't go wrong.
